name: Ubud Raya Resort Group
address: Jl. Raya Sayan Jl. Sindu No.Br, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Beautiful rooms and Amazing staff. They are really helpful and cater to your needs. Here we get Villas not rooms for our stay(I took a 1 room version), we got a room with attached toilet with bathtub(big enough to fit 2 people in it) , there is a kitchen outside with utensils(also if you need anything they will bring it to you within 10mins), there is also an outdoor shower, and the best part is the pool. Amazing clean pool with a decent depth(i am 174cm and the water is up to my neck). You can jump into the pool i mean. Do try their floating breakfast it's fun. Also they can provide you with a beautiful romantic dinner (please inform them a day before). They also have a spa where you can get massages and all. It's amazing spot for honeymooners. Loved every moment of the stay.
review 2:
Ubud Raya Villas provide a serene sanctuary amidst the jungle, though the presence of insects and lizards might deter some. The highlight of the stay is undeniably the spacious private pool, perfect for unwinding amidst nature's embrace. What truly sets this villa apart is the exceptional service provided by the staff members, who consistently go the extra mile to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

While the restaurant offerings may not be exceptional, the complimentary breads and fruits offered upon checkout are a thoughtful gesture that adds to the overall experience. The welcome massage, albeit short, offers a rejuvenating start to the stay.

One drawback is the villa's distance from the main town, requiring additional travel time for those looking to explore beyond the jungle surroundings. However, the lush green ambiance of the Manipura room creates a deep connection with nature, making it an ideal choice for nature enthusiasts seeking tranquility.

In conclusion, despite its remote location, Ubud Raya Villas offers a memorable retreat for those seeking solace amidst Bali's natural beauty, complemented by exceptional service and a refreshing private pool experience.
review 3:
Very good hospitality and huge resort, it's great and calm, the arrangements and the rooms are very nice, it's kind of honeymoon treat to newly wed couples.

Resort is grand.
Swimming pool is clean and calming, the bath tub arrangement is good.
review 4:
A two bedroom villa doesn't have a bathtub in another bedroom. We lived in Yudhishthir villa where too much Lizards ü¶é was present. Whole night we took Frog üê∏ sound. Also There is Mouse roaming in washroom üêÄ.
Indian food was not there.
The kitchen is available but, they don't have Utensils to cook something. No use of the kitchen.
review 5: The villa was spacious with all the facilities for a comfortable stay. The service was great too but the limited choice for breakfast is underwhelming. They provide only 1 veg or 1 non-veg dish for breakfast along with a fruit drink. The location of the resort is far from the city too. So, wandering out of the resort for light shopping is fruitless. The staff is welcoming and we'll mannered and takes care of you in every aspect.

name: The Kampung Ubud Villa
address: Jalan Raya Sayan, Br. Sindu, Sayan, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Excellent villa for a memorable and comfortable stay. We stayed here for 3 nights and we had booked 4 villa rooms. The service and staff were excellent. The villa rooms were superb for a stay and all the rooms had a private swimming pool which was also extremely clean. Room and the pool were cleaned daily. Their is an outdoor kitchenette with each villa which is enough to cook in case one prefers with gas and cutlery provided.

Breakfast is not like a spread but guests had to choose from 8-9 options that they provide. Its enough for a person and tasty too.

We also tried their "floating breakfast" service, a first for us and a very nice experience.

Highly recommend this place for a family stay.
review 2:
For us it was bad experience, room had lot of insects. The room service phone was not working so for every small thing we had to walk to reception even at odd times, they kept on telling we will get it repaired buy no one came. Breakfast was pathetic. They didn't even deliver what they committed to us they said, we forgot!! Unprofessional and untrained staff. Would never visit again.
No one even came for room cleaning. Shower is not proper, hot water facility is poor, there is bath tub but without hot water and slow water flow it is of no use. Restaurant is also not there.
review 3:
It‚Äôs a worst place to stay for anyone. The room had lot of insects and mosquitoes and we complained they changed the room to a more worse one. The rooms didn‚Äôt have a faucet as well and the furniture is so old. Recommended not to stay in this hotel and the staff is very unprofessional and don‚Äôt understand basic English.

Recommendation: 0/5
review 4:
Beautiful, Spacious & calm Villa available at UBUD!!
Must book for spending some Quality time
As it offers open kitchen followed by spacious Pool for couple & lastly the room Size & Service offered by caretaker!!
Birds chuckling in morning, felt pleasant.

Friendly environment maintained by caretaker!!
Must book this place..
review 5:
Warning! Stay Away from The Kampung Ubud Villa ‚Äì A Disappointing Experience

Our stay at The Kampung Ubud Villa was a total letdown. The pictures they showed online were totally different from what we got. The room we got was small and not at all like what we booked.

When we complained, the hotel staff didn‚Äôt listen and refused to give us our money back. It felt like they were cheating us.

If you‚Äôre thinking of staying at The Kampung Ubud Villa, think again. Don‚Äôt make the same mistake we did. Look for another place to stay where they treat you right. This hotel isn‚Äôt worth your time or money. Avoid it if you can.

name: PUKU Bali
address: Jl. Raya Sayan, banjar sindu, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: The food is awesome. The owners are so welcoming. Like meeting an old friend. My wife and I had the best breakfast. Spicy ramen and crispy pork belly. Everyone in ubud should come here and look put at the fields while contemplating life.
review 2: I will never order from this place again. They don't take accountability for their long service (which took 90 minutes to get my meal) and I specifically asked for no green onions and my meals had green onions. Blaming having no drivers is false. My order started at 12:45pm. My first grab driver cancelled because the order was not prepared. As my second driver arrived, my order was still no prepared he had to wait 40 minutes. After an hour, I asked my driver to ask the kitchen how much longer it will be, he said another 15 minutes. In total it took 90 minutes which I would have order from another restaurant.
review 3: Well worth the visit. I had the miso soup but could not taste the miso. Then I had the smoked chicken soup, small but nice. The pork buns were delicious. Quiet place. I just wish there was no smoking. Noodles are fresh homemade.
review 4: This restaurant offers amazing ramen and asian style sandwiches. The service is great, as well as the place itself - it has nice rice field view
review 5: Very lovely experience. I never do reviews,  however I feel the need to commend this restaurant on their hospitality and impeccable food. The spicy chicken dumplings are a whole mile better than any other country I have been too. You need to come here if you are in Ubud.

name: Villa sindu ubud
address: F6JP+P3P, Sayan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Fantastic place away from hustling bustle of city life.Perfect place if you want a peaceful abode & a fantastic host.Amazing host with great heart. Always willing to give their best for whatever demands were made by us. Extremely impressed & glad i booked this.Please note the location is away from Ubud central & so you chose this if you want a peaceful & serene place.Every bit of the room & place has been meticulously designed.Example- I forgot my international Adapter & it was there.
Specific items i ordered for breakfast & it was available with lots of commitment.Again i had to leave early but the host had a big heart to refund the remaining amount which the owner was bot supposed to as per the agreement
review 2:
Just book! Don‚Äôt search any further for accommodation in Ubud.

Glad we booked and had such a positive experience.

Great host and mindfully done craftsmanship in every inch of the property. Stay there to enjoy the warmth, hospitality, and tranquility.
review 3: I absolutely enjoyed my stay here at Villa Sindu! Everything was amazing from the delicious breakfast made every morning by Mary. To the attentive service of Dewa to all my needs. The grounds were kept beautifully and I really enjoyed laying on the hammock and hearing the nature. I also enjoyed sitting by the koi pond and watching the fish. My bed was very comfortable and the strong fan and air conditioner kept me cool at night. As a solo female traveler feeling safe was very important and I absolutely did. The center of Ubud is a short distance. When I come back to Bali I will definitely be staying here again. I absolutely recommend staying here if you‚Äôre traveling to Ubud!
review 4:
Everything about Villa Sindu was exceptional, a slice of paradise, away from the tourist hotspots and all to ourselves.  Dewa (host)and staff made our stay feel like a home away from home, everything from our daily breakfasts, massages (every 2 days),  rides into Ubud central and the fantastic, fun, informative private tourist trip driver( Waylenüòä)was organised making this our first holiday to Bali memorable, remarkable and already dreaming of our return visit to the Villa and the lovely people we met there.
Highly recommended 10/10
review 5: This villa is so beautifully appointed by Dewa, we felt like we were walking into a secret garden. It is very private. There are three individual cottages each with their own gorgeous outdoor bathroom. Breakfast is lovely. You will need a driver to get to downtown Ubud.

name: O2 Unix Ubud
address: F6HQ+XP3, Jl. Raya Sayan, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Nice place to stop for a coffee and bite to eat.
The back terrace overlooks green fields.
Inside the d√©cor is industrial minimalist. Music is a bit loud but perhaps I'm getting too old! üòÖ
Coffee was decent, I had the waffle which was well presented and very tasty.
review 2:
First timer here everyone...and I'm loving it!
eat fried rice for the main meal, but I forgot to take a pictureüôà, For dessert I chose waffle with vanilla ice cream ü§§
Aaahhh...my 'me time' is perfectoüòâ
Lovely atmosphere, a wide range of foods, and the staff is awesome üëå
Will be back again soonü•∞
Annnnndddd last but n·ªçt least there are lots of places for photos üòç
review 3:
This is my second time I visited this cafe, Very bad experience, when I entered the cafe all the staff were friendly. but when the food arrived there were many things wrong, I ordered pineapple juice, banana milkshake, burrito, rice paper roll and fettuccine carbonara.
I ordered a banana milkshake but banana juice came, I asked for a change like the order I requested but I couldn't because the bananas had run out. and I asked for banana juice that had been made but the employee said it had been thrown away?!
Finally I ordered a chocolate milkshake, when the female employee brought me the drink, her face looked like she was annoyed. She just put the drink on the table and didn't say anything, until my husband said thank you but the employee didn't respond anything .
I ordered fetuchini carbonara but came was spaghetti carbonara, here I didn't ask for anything because I was already lazy with the grumpy look on the employee's face. I really want to get out of this cafe quickly.

the cafe menu is very interesting, but the food that comes is beyond expectations, 4/10 . The chair also not safety for children
review 4: great place, coffee and food are very worth it, good service

name: Tattva Ubud Retreat & Wellness
address: Jl. Raya Sayan Jl. Sindu No.Br, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Every morning before 6am they blast music over loud speakers by the river. Then the screaming yoga starts. They have zero respect for the people living in the village around the property.
review 2:
Really we like much how the stuff their very friendly and helpful
And always smile
They are amazing
And the management very helpful they even make for us late chick out and they didn't charge us
Everyone in the hotel will help you morning night
Thank you everyone
In raya riverside
review 3: Really good and cozy hotel. The staff was really good and helpful! Highly recommended! The yoga session in the morning with @SAMARA was awesome!
review 4: Best place to stay in Ubud
review 5: TTC 100 hours with Guru Eka Sukma. Great teacher and nice place.

name: WR. Diteba Ubud
address: Sayan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
They have the best RUJAK GURITA IN TOWN!
Cumi suna cekuh is super yummy and all fish menu is deliciouse and taste like Balinese fushion dish. The owner is super friendly, dont know how to describe all their food since almost all food that I have been try is all deliciousü•≥ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥
Best pork Belly in ubud with their signature sambal matahü•≥
review 2: Haven‚Äôt tasted such good Pork dishes!! A must experience!
review 3: Amazing food, amazing chef and a really cute puppy named belly! Highly recommend anyone to come when in Ubud. Can't wait to come backüëç
review 4: As foreigner foodies we loved this place.  Their beer is limited but the food was amazing and if you ask them to make a cocktail using local booze you'll be blown away. Great experience and very affordable
review 5:
Hidden gem in Sayan, great food and hospitality from Krsna and his wife.
He makes a delicious Arak Whysky, a must.
Thank you for all the positive vibrations.
Peace!

name: RM PADANG Simpang Tiga
address: F6JQ+GR3, Jl. Raya Sayan, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: It's my favorite Padang around Sayan. Always good quality food. Like pricing in any Padang place sometimes it is a bit off - the same thing you get might not always the same price.
review 2: Natural , cool, experience for your life
review 3: Their food ready in full set after lunch time
review 4: Great place, yummy, clean and simple.

name: Babi Guling Seken
address: YULY GARDEN GIANYAR, Jl. Raya Tebongkang, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
A little known Warung that we chanced upon.

The meat was soo tender and the skin wad perfectly done.
They also had a kids size portion for the little ones.

It has a nice view overlooking the rice padi fields too.
review 2: Delicious babi guling, the sambal... and the crackling! Crunchy one side and soft on the other. It's crackling magic. So peaceful with the working farm next door. For 3 people with beer I paid equivalent of $27 AUD. So affordable, definitely worth the visit!
review 3: All is perfect. Really nice taste and awesome view of paddy‚Äôs farm.
review 4: Best seat environment n best taste

name: Warung Carik
address: Jalan Raya Buduk Sayan, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: It's clean and a modern minimalist house that use for warung at the front. Friendly atmosphere and yummy food. Ayam betutu, sayur urap and Babi kecap/begenyol are the most favoutite ones. For those who love real Balinese traditional food you must come and enjoy it. And it's not pricy though. The warung is always crowded since its open daily at 7.30 am. All the guest mostly local and mixed with european as well. If you go to Ubud, YOU MUST COME and Taste it. Fully recommended
review 2: The food here is delicious, restaurant is really comfy and the bathroom is super clean. The chef even accommodated to the requests for some of us to prepare Indo mie goreng, which tasted excellent.
review 3: Affordable and probably the most delicious traditional Balinese chicken in the area.
review 4: The most tasty traditional balinese food in Sayan-Ubud

review 1: Street food with delicious taste in Sayan Village, Ubud, Bali. It offers grilled tilapia, fried chicken, and vegetables with chilli sauce. Opens in the evening with semi permanent tent and tables. Recommended as an affordable family dinner.
review 2: 5 stars for this street food tenant because they have a delicious grilled chicken!!!
